mapper.select: SELECT M.MEMBER_NUMBER, M.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_NAME, M.MEMBER_JUMIN, M.MEMBER_PHONE, M.MEMBER_EMAIL, M.MEMBER_ADDRESS1, M.MEMBER_ADDRESS2, SUM (P.POINT_POINT) MEMBER_POINT FROM MEMBER M, POINT P WHERE MEMBER_ADMIN= '0' AND M.MEMBER_NUMBER = P.MEMBER_NUMBER GROUP BY M.MEMBER_NUMBER, M.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_NAME, M.MEMBER_JUMIN, M.MEMBER_PHONE, M.MEMBER_EMAIL, M.MEMBER_ADDRESS1, M.MEMBER_ADDRESS2 ORDER BY MEMBER_NUMBER DESC

SELECT M.MEMBER_NUMBER, M.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_PASSWORD, M.MEMBER_NAME, M.MEMBER_JUMIN, M.MEMBER_ZIPCODE, M.MEMBER_ADDRESS1, M.MEMBER_ADDRESS2, M.MEMBER_PHONE, M.MEMBER_EMAIL, SUM (P.POINT_POINT) MEMBER_POINT FROM MEMBER M, POINT P WHERE M.MEMBER_NUMBER = P.MEMBER_NUMBER AND M.MEMBER_NUMBER = #{MEMBER_NUMBER} GROUP BY M.MEMBER_NUMBER, M.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_PASSWORD, M.MEMBER_NAME, M.MEMBER_JUMIN, M.MEMBER_ZIPCODE, M.MEMBER_ADDRESS1, M.MEMBER_ADDRESS2, M.MEMBER_PHONE, M.MEMBER_EMAIL
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_PASSWORD = #{MEMBER_PASSWORD}, MEMBER_NAME = #{MEMBER_NAME}, MEMBER_ZIPCODE = #{MEMBER_ZIPCODE}, MEMBER_ADDRESS1 = #{MEMBER_ADDRESS1}, MEMBER_ADDRESS2 = #{MEMBER_ADDRESS2}, MEMBER_PHONE = #{MEMBER_PHONE}, MEMBER_EMAIL = #{MEMBER_EMAIL} WHERE MEMBER_NUMBER = #{MEMBER_NUMBER}
INSERT INTO POINT ( MEMBER_NUMBER, POINT_CONTENT, POINT_POINT, POINT_DATE, POINT_NUMBER) VALUES (#{MEMBER_NUMBER}, '관리자', #{POINT_POINT}, SYSDATE, POINT_NUMBER_SEQ.NEXTVAL)
